author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-SA'S ‍Competition Commission Fines Caxton,Independent Media For Cartel Conduct
text:
Feb 16 (Reuters) - ‍Competition Commission Of South Africa​
* ‍COMPETITION COMMISSION OF SOUTH AFRICA​ - ‍MEDIA COMPANIES FINED MILLIONS FOR CARTEL CONDUCT​
* SA‘S COMPETITION COMMISSION - INDEPENDENT MEDIA​ AND CAXTON ‍ADMITTED TO PARTICIPATING IN PRICE FIXING AND FIXING OF TRADING CONDITIONS
* COMPETITION COMMISSION OF SOUTH AFRICA - ‍CAXTON HAS AGREED TO A PENALTY OF R5.8 MILLION​
* COMPETITION COMMISSION OF SOUTH AFRICA- ‍INDEPENDENT HAS AGREED TO PAY AN ADMINISTRATIVE PENALTY AMOUNTING TO R2.2 MILLION Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 80 6749 1136)
